questions.question: How do you not define, but at least think about what it means to be intelligent?
Do you think in terms of evolutionary timeline and history, the development of the neocortex was a big leap?
How do you know which one has done the best job of forming the cup?
What do you think are its strengths relative to your major efforts of constructing a theory of human intelligence?
If you look at the history of artificial intelligence, where do you think we stand?
Do you have any ideas of what, why the heck it is that we have a subjective experience at all?
So do you think we are the only intelligent life out there in the universe?
